title: WikiLeaks E-Mail Says Obama Directed His Supporters to Engage in ‘All-American Voter Fraud’
subtitle: One WikiLeaks e-mail referenced unproven rumors that the Obama campaign had "flooded" the 2008 Iowa Democratic caucuses with out-of-state voters.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The WikiLeaks 'Podesta archive' included an e-mail that stated President Obama had "directed his supporters in Colorado to engage in a little all-American voter fraud."
